snippet: A series of missteps led to the posting of personal data about nearly 20,000 Stanford Hospital patients on the Web, the hospital and private contractors say.
lead_paragraph: A series of missteps led to the posting of personal data about nearly 20,000 Stanford Hospital patients on the Web, the hospital and private contractors say.

headline.main: Patient Data Landed Online After a Series of Missteps
headline.print_headline: How Did Data About Patients Land on Web? Don’t Even Ask
headline.seo: Stanford Hospital Patient Data Breach Is Detailed
